title: There is Hope: Even in the Worst of Circumstances
description: Remember they say, "that the darkest hour of all, is the hour before day" Life was peaceful once, and then they came. Hideous creatures from beyond our solar system, with power and technology far beyond what our imaginations could conceive, and they want our resources. It just so happens that the resources they want are us . . . humans. With war on the horizon, invasion within sight, what could possibly be done to save humanity? Can humanity be saved?
author: Victoria Rasmus
